body_html: @weiliu620 It will not go into official TensorFlow code. There's considerable complexity in the module and nobody in the core team feels comfortable enough to assume ownership of it. However, since it's pure Python, it doesn't need to be part of the core. I'm working on getting a single-file version working so you could "install" the mode by copy pasting it into your file. The main core dependency is persistent tensors which should be working in upcoming release (0.10) after which I can release this mode. Do you have any specific use-cases in mind? In particular, I have the regular l-BFGS, but wondering if I need to do specific line-search additions

body: @weiliu620 It will not go into official TensorFlow code. There's considerable complexity in the module and nobody in the core team feels comfortable enough to assume ownership of it. However, since it's pure Python, it doesn't need to be part of the core. I'm working on getting a single-file version working so you could "install" the mode by copy pasting it into your file. The main core dependency is persistent tensors which should be working in upcoming release (0.10) after which I can release this mode. Do you have any specific use-cases in mind? In particular, I have the regular l-BFGS, but wondering if I need to do specific line-search additions
